duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage several infrastructure-related projects in the planning stage or about to initiate, including Windows 11 upgrade, North America printer cost reduction, and boardroom and training rooms technology buildout.
Oversee boardroom upgrade, training room upgrade, and printer upgrade, while being able to present to C-Suite and handle lots of vendor calls.
Pure Project Management, capable of running 6-8 small projects simultaneously.
Dynamic and able to pivot as needed.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in IT, Computer Science, or related field (Master's preferred)
